data.title: Sublimination.
data.body: I bought this for my wife to make t-shirts with and it has paid for itself multiple times. Its Cartridge-free convenience, wireless functionality, and vibrant color output make it a standout choice. The super tank design is awesome, providing more prints and fewer refills. Efficient scanning and copying capabilities add to its versatility. No more traditional ink hassles. It's a reliable all-in-one solution that truly delivers!
